##  Know Before You Go 

We're here to ensure you have the best experience possible! If you still have any questions after reviewing this information, feel free to reach out—we're more than happy to assist with anything you need.

Call us at [404.979.6455](tel:+14049796455)

  * ####  Location 

The Museum of Design Atlanta is conveniently located in the Midtown Arts District, right across the street from the Woodruff Arts Center at [**1315 Peachtree St. NE Atlanta, GA 30309**](https://www.google.com/maps/place/1315+Peachtree+St+NE,+Atlanta,+GA+30309/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x88f5044543d23177:0xe196d8504d00a161?sa=X&ved=1t:242&ictx=111)**.**

MODA is located on the ground floor of the 1315 Peachtree Building. The building is a mix use ...

## Get to Know MODA

Founded in 1989, MODA is the only museum in the Southeast that’s all about design. From architecture  
to graphic design and beyond, our exhibitions explore how design shapes our world.

We believe design can spark change, improve lives, and help build a better future — and we’re here  
to celebrate that every day.

**_Share our belief in the power of design? If so, support MODA._**
